rules_text:
[i]Killer Service [/i]– {T}: Target creature you control gains, “[i]Crit[/i] – When this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.”
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if two or more creatures you control dealt combat damage to the same player, transform Flora, Icy Twin.
Partner with Felicia, Icy Twin
